## Full Pipeline Verified

```python
from blueprint.generator import decompose_goal, infer_interfaces, assemble_blueprint
from blueprint.parser import parse_markdown
from blueprint.validator import validate

goal = "Build a todo CLI with add/list/remove"
tasks = decompose_goal(goal)           # 9 tasks
enriched = infer_interfaces(tasks)     # Interface contracts
markdown = assemble_blueprint(enriched, goal)  # 8649 chars
parsed = parse_markdown(markdown)
result = validate(parsed)              # âœ… Valid
```
